text: Hi everyone! I hope someone can give me a hint here :raised_hands::raised_hands:  I have a workflow with Custom coded actions (3) and delays between them (2 minutes). It works well, except for when there’s a deal on the delay step and another one passing through the previous step. It seems a variable that only lives on the custom coded action  stays populated with the information from the first deal and then it adds the info from the second deal (current deal) on top. The variable is an empty array and i add values using a push method. Why this happens and how do you usually manage it? Thanks a lot!
If the variables are defined outside the main function, you can have these kinds of artefacts - if my guess is correct, try to move those into the main function and try again.
Ohhh, so it’s basically a scope issue? It worked! Thanks a lot!
Is there a way to clear the email hard bounce reason property once you removed the email that hard bounced?
